title: Student Asisstant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Clayton College & State University (Morrow, GA)
Interview Descriptions: The interview was very straight forward pertaining to the position. Each question was geared to the responsibilities of the position. The whole process was smooth and there were no blindsides.
Interview Questions: What skills do you think would benefit you in this role?

title: Resident Director Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at Clayton College & State University (Morrow, GA) in Jul 2021
Interview Descriptions: Great Interview, process with all staff on campus. I wish the HR process moved along at a more rapid pace. It took far too long to be processed in the system.
Interview Questions: What is you goal in this position coming in?

title: Outreach Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Clayton College & State University (Atlanta, GA)
Interview Descriptions: panel of questions and presentation on the department. the pros and cons of working in higher education and how the center for academic success helps students. How would you make the department better and improve on programs.
Interview Questions: The same " tell me about a time when...." type of questions

title: Student Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Clayton College & State University (Morrow, GA) in Apr 2018
Interview Descriptions: They had student workers interview us, and they asked us questions. Recently for new employees, the management would interview them. I guess because they don't trust student employees anymore to do those tasks.
Interview Questions: What is your experience with physical fitness?

title: Assistant Professor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Clayton College & State University (Atlanta, GA) in Jan 2017
Interview Descriptions: phone interview followed with on-site interview, the progress is relative easy to follow through and straight forward.  interviewed by HR and then school faculty phone interview, it was professional

title: Academic Advisor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Clayton College & State University (Morrow, GA) in Sept 2016
Interview Descriptions: organized, staff made me feel comfortable, able to meet current staff members it the department and wasn't intimating. Made me excited to work for the department! interview took place in the office where I would work and was able to meet with my potential advisor. Although I would have liked to meet other advisors to hear their current experience, the interviewers still gave me great insight on the position and their expectations for candidates
Interview Questions: what experience would prepare you for the position.

title: Student Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Clayton College & State University (Morrow, GA) in Jun 2016
Interview Descriptions: Pretty good and straight forward. Nothing too complicated. The questions asked were behavioral such as what are your goals and previous work experience (if you had any). Nothing was hard to answer.
Interview Questions: What can you bring new to this department?

title: Customer Service Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Clayton College & State University
Interview Descriptions: Asked questions regarding previous experience.  What would do if you had to go against the rules and or policy?  Name a time when you had to go against a policy or rule with your previous employer?

title: Student Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Clayton College & State University (Morrow, GA) in Aug 2014
Interview Descriptions: the interview process was standard about 20-30 minutes. different departments varies from 1-5 people, the interviewer made the atmosphere comfortable and after discussing past experience and work ethics I was informed after two weeks via email that I was offered the position
Interview Questions:
what are your strengths?
what is your weakness?
How are you with time management?

title: Facility Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Clayton College & State University (Morrow, GA) in Aug 2014
Interview Descriptions: For this position, you had to already been employed by the department. For this interview, there was a group of people interviewing you asking questions like how would you deal with a certain situation. Each person took turns in asking you questions. This kind of interview may be intimidating to some especially if you don't know them. Since I already knew the interviewers, it made the interviewing process less stressful.
Interview Questions: Name five safety related problems or concerns that need to be addressed in the fitness center.

title: Landscaper I Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Clayton College & State University
Interview Descriptions:
I applied online, and was called back in a couple of days. Process took about a week and a half from initial call back to start date.

I applied online and received a call for a face to face interview. I interviewed with the Assistant Director of Landscaping and the Landscaping Lead field man. The interview wasn't so much about asking me interview questions as it was about telling the job description. I was very personable, and had a little experience on my resume, which i think got me the job. 3 days after to interview, I got a call and was offered to position. No training process, no drug test, just suit up and start.

title: Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Clayton College & State University (Morrow, GA) in Sept 2013
Interview Descriptions: Applied, phone call, interview, received job

title: Desk Attendant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Clayton College & State University (Morrow, GA) in Aug 2012
Interview Descriptions: I went on the website too look for job opportunities and applied for a couple of positions. I got an email stating I was a good fit for a some positions and met with the hiring manager.
Interview Questions: why do you want to work on campus

title: Peer Tutor Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Clayton College & State University (Morrow, GA) in Aug 2011
Interview Descriptions: The job application and job interview was a simple and yet a time consuming process. I had to fill out paper work, submit it to the department director, wait to be interviewed, attend the interview, and wait from there.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to be a tutor?
